headline: 2024 Presidential Election Trump Criticized Remarks Nikki Haleys Husbands Military Service
summary: GOP presidential candidates Donald Trump and Nikki Haley have recently clashed over the former president’s remarks jabbing at Haley’s husband, Major Michael Haley.The Details:Michael Haley is a member of the South Carolina Army National Guard and is currently serving in Africa. At a rally on Saturday, Trump told a story in which Haley had told him she would not run against him. Noting Michael Haley’s absence, Trump said, “What happened to her husband? What happened to her husband? Where is he? He’s gone! He knew.” On Tuesday, Trump posted on Truth Social that Haley was “an embarrassment to her wonderful husband, in Africa. I think he should come back home to help save her dying campaign.”Haley’s Response:“If you mock the service of a combat veteran, you don’t deserve a driver’s license, let alone being President of the United States,” the former South Carolina governor said at a rally.
